title: Looking For Ranked Duo Partner! (Preferably Silver+)
body:
Hey Guys & Girls (Gender Equality :3)
To all who have hopelessly pondered here the title pretty much describes what im looking for xD
Im currently B1 almost getting to silver {{item:3070}} but i've had alot of afk's and rager's in the past few games and it's dragging me down :/
So im looking for someone with a brain (of course) and hopefully climb a few divisions and elo.
Currently a mid main but i'm picking jungle and support pretty easily

IGN: Gobby Giver 
Rank: Bronze 1 (Promo's)
Bio: Dedicated gamer that likes to be competitive and have fun whilst gaming ;) (Don't wanna write too much here)
Age: 16
Best Lane: Mid
Best Champs: {{champion:157}} {{champion:7}}   (and other midlane champs)
KDA: Depends but can consistently get over 3:00

That'll be all if you want to discuss further don't hesistate to add me and msg me :3
